title: Evaluate removing nightly requirement (omendb not in core)

logs.msg: rust-toolchain.toml sets nightly for portable_simd (omendb). Since memory/omendb is a separate plugin not in core, we may not need nightly. Check if any src/ code requires nightly features. If not, switch to stable.
Evaluated: nightly still required. omendb is used in src/memory/mod.rs, not a plugin.
